author: Amy Duncan
title: Sister Sledge star Joni Sledge dies aged 60
text:
Joni Sledge of Sister Sledge, performing at Tramlines Festival in July 2014, has died (Picture: Andrew Benge/Redferns via Getty Images) Joni Sledge, who was one quarter of 70s group Sister Sledge, has died at the age of 60.
The remaining members of Sister Sledge confirmed the sad news on the group’s Facebook page.
Joni was found dead by a friend at her Phoenix, Arizona home on Friday, the band’s publicist, Biff Warren, said on Saturday.
 
We love you Joni. pic.twitter.com/6Zxj6gLoQh 
— Sister Sledge (@SisterSledge_) March 12, 2017 

Joni’s cause of death is not yet known but it is understood she was ill.
Sister Sledge last performed in October, with only Joni, Kim and Debbie being part of the current line-up.
